snippet: The Mexican authorities say Salvador Alfonso Martínez Escobedo planned the killings of dozens of Central and South Americans hauled from buses and trucks heading north.
abstract: Mexican authorities say captured Zetas drug gang member Salvador Alfonso Martinez Escobedo is responsible for massacres of dozens of migrants, as well as killing of David M Hartley, American citizen.
lead_paragraph: The Mexican authorities say Salvador Alfonso Martínez Escobedo planned the killings of dozens of Central and South Americans hauled from buses and trucks heading north.

headline.seo: Mexican Drug Leader Arrested in Massacre
headline.main: Mexico Gang Leader Held in Massacre of Migrants
